Nov. 29, 2020 D Swiss National Championships (Excellence Division)
Swiss National Championships (Excellence Division) 0 Set Test and Own Choice Swiss National Championships swiss-national-championships-excellence-section European Championships The current Record Holder is Brass Band Treize Etoiles with 13 Titles in Excellence Division. Switzerland
Excellence
The World Rejoicing (Variations on a Lutheran Chorale)
Music and Convention Centre (Auditorium Stravinski), Montreux, VD, Switzerland After trying best to safe the Contests the Host and SBBV finally had to cancel this Year's Edition completely due to the still very uncertain COVID-19- Pandemic Development.
